euccs-wikimedia-public-policy-title: Title for the link to Wikimedia public policy
euccs-take-action-label: Text on link button that jumps to a section on the page
euccs-take-action-heading: Heading of the section above the form
euccs-footer-links: Specifies the links in the footer area of this skin
euccs-trademarks-hint: Information about trademarks in the footer
euccs-licence-hint: Information about the licence in the footer
euccs-wikimedia-foundation-link-title: Title of link to official Wikimedia Foundation website
